title: Azure Pipelines Linux Agent
description: Install an Azure Pipelines Agent on Linux

url.description: The URL of your Azure DevOps instance (e.g. https://dev.azure.com/foo or http://tfs.foo.com:8080/tfs)

pool.description: The name of the Agent Pool that this agent will be registered in
